<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeVectorCompose"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeVectorCompose

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeVectorBase](class_visualshadernodevectorbase.md) **<** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Composes a [Vector2](class_vector2.md), [Vector3](class_vector3.md) or 4D vector (represented as a [Quaternion](class_quaternion.md)) from scalars within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Creates a ``vec2``, ``vec3`` or ``vec4`` using scalar values that can be provided from separate inputs.
